title: FontShop KeyWording.?
content:
_First of all, sorry, if this may not be suitable for a public forum, but anyway.:_   
   
So, Ive signed up for FontShops KeyWording Project, a few weeks ago; Ive keyworded   
around 51 Fonts, to try the whole keywording system, and then I contacted FontShop   
( Two times, by now ) to ask for my 'Reward', a single FontFont, free of charge,   
like they state, wherever they advertise and 'recruit' for their project, and, Nothing..   
No response, no reaction, and, certainly, no reward..   
_( Maybe it just takes some time, for them, but no reaction, at all, within the last weeks,   
is not quite what I expected.. )_      
   
Anybody else experienced any problems with keywording typefaces for FontShop,   
and / or 'exchanging' their services for FontFonts.?   
   
_( If any Typophile Admin has a problem with me posting this in here, please feel free to delete / move / remove this thread.. Thanks, and, Hmm, Sorry.. )_
author: formlos

comments.content: Well, my rewards answer took about 5 or 6 days. Did you filled the form?

Thanks for your reply, Hï¿½ctor..   
Of course.. Sure, I sent them the form, two times by now, more than two weeks ago ( for the first time ) and about a week ago ( for the second time )..

Thank you, Stephen.. It sure helped.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123010720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
_( They replied to me, with the 'reward' attached, shortly after you posted your reply to this thread.. )_   
   
So, Thanks, Stephen, and, Finally, Thanks, FontShop.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123010720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
